You SHOULD aim to get sss+ crimson weave as f2p. Crimson Weave stands out among Gen 2 units by having the highest percentage damage for her signature move compared to others in the same generation. Her SS3 skill is a game-changer, significantly boosting her overall damage. The impact is so substantial that it triples her damage output. Equipping her with a 2-piece Cottie Memory set enables an instant trigger of her signature move. This setup enhances her damage potential and allows for strategic use of her powerful moves. Crimson Weave is recognized as the best DPS unit among other Gen 2 attacker class units. Her exceptional damage output is not limited to a specific element. Crimson Weave's high damage allows her to score impressively in other elemental warzone stages as well as in PPC, showcasing her versatility and effectiveness across different scenarios.

As you all know we only get one shot at pulling black rock shooter and her sig weapon, BRS out damages lamia at SSS, Brs is just essential for fire team and the upcoming Watanabe epitaph, pulling for lamia is unwise and is a bad move.

(2) Snow petal coating for baltar is getting another rerun during the black rock shooter , so that means if you want the snow petal coating, you only have one more chance to get it until 2027 when it most likely reruns again.

(3) Stronger charecters like void luna and qu shukra who are premier DPS charecters that can make or break your account will be coming. You may ruin your account if you pull for lamia. Your account may be ruined

(4) Lamia is the Weakest gen 2 attacker and has the worst damage output. Lee hyperreal is far stronger and far more superior than her and it is a known fact, so is alpha crimson weave and charecters such as Alisa echo. Even charecters such as camu out damage her

(5) If you don't want to save, you can choose to gain extra copies of the charecters you have such as Liv empyrea who are critical charecters that offer support. Lamia is just unnecessary.

It is just a complain. It is rogue activity, but you need to do a different place to earn random buff. That means one need to do 20min game thousands of time in order to get the buff you need. By the way, the buffs pool is really small. Just add base or element attack, increase recovery, enhance change speed and increase certain character,s skill. So, while there is no funny random here, just another silly farming process. Also, the monsters in this farm area has really high attack, so one need to focus one attention in order not to die suddenly. What's more, since it put some strong elite monster in the farm area, when I want to kill them first, the stupid targeting system always target the farthest one. Besides, it put lots of strong boss in the farm, those who willing jump everywhere with a time limit, so half the time, I just waist 20min earn nothing. I just want to ask. Is there any reason to make farm so hard. In addition, each character can enhance just use those buff. And to pass a stage, one need to enhance 15 characters, each need hundred buffs to reach stage's recommended level. So, in short, I guess I need to place it at least 3 hr a day in order to reach their need. Are you insane!

This game was and still is super fun and engaging with the captivating story and insanely fun and fast combat. But this game is no longer supportive and accessible like it once was, and it shows.

Before, at maximum, units needed only SS to be functional, of which is obtainable for free. However, now, you are required to have signature weapon with at least one resonance + harmonization, maxed out SS cub, and in a lot of cases, SS3 or even SSS as well for certain voucherable units. The future introduction of affixes into the game only further exacerbates this problem , as well as the devs increasingly creating innate nerfs to new characters' core passives units in order to require SS3 more and more often, at a pace that most people cant keep up with.

This however, isn't even the end of it, because now with synchronization, your money, if you choose to spend, is now only a fraction of what it used to be. Synchronization, motivated by shallow reasoning from the “community,” (which is really a convenient excuse for them to find a way to save money for licensing costs for collabs,) aims to get global servers and other regions on the same schedule as China. However in doing so, they shortened patches to do this without proper compensation for spenders. They, now thanks to the new system, do not have discounted packs, battlepasses, or monthlies, nor do they get more for their cost; instead, they are solely given the option to buy multiple in bulk for the same previous unit price. Essentially, spenders, particular lower end ones with small budgets, now have to pay 2-3x as quickly to get THE SAME AMOUNT. UNBELIEVABLE! Where before, spending just Monthly A+BP was enough to sustain most people, everyone is left shafted, unless you are some millionaire heir with a trust fund.

Overall, this game has fallen very fall from its promise to be an accommodating, affordable gacha game in the past 1.5 years, and I hope they can come back to their senses before it's too late.

Coming home from the hellish workplace by 6pm, back in the dorm, opening pgr is the first thing you did, done claiming the daily 30 bc and 100 bc from monthly, can't wait to call kurogames your daddy. Looking at that full 3s team that can't even have 5 weapon reso, you smiled and opened today's warzone, you ignored void zone which needs skill and immediately dipped into lightning zone right away. You're lucky that it's boss zone today, which can let your brain to not function much.

For the starter it'll definitely be crimson weave, you're using some useless swordwaves like a clown and feel that you're cool ass af. Finally, the rng gave you a set of blue 3pings, you 3pinged and hold dodge then got 250 passive stacks just like your IQ. You used garnet's qte, imagining you can do some cool ass double slams and enter the next rotation.
With your malfunctioning hand, you did a 126 stack holdge dodge slam, while you're looking at your iframe sliding through the mobs, it feels like you have set the soul of action game on fire, you feel like that's certain as the peak of katana master. After you repeatedly holding dodge and slam for 4 minutes, your warzone is over. You smiled when you're looking at your own 1.5m lightning zone score in leader bracket, when you someone above you with the same investment scored 3.2m, your single braincelled head is thinking is that guy using cheat/is that guy using some backdoor service, why can I only get such score with the same setup
